main.name: Swapnaneel Ray
main.description: I know the tech, let's build something!
main.bio: Hi there! I am Swapnaneel, a sophomore at Jadavpur University pursuing Information Technology with a strong academic record (9.19 CGPA). I am passionate about software development, with a keen interest in website and application development. My projects include 'AlgoAid,' an AI-powered Chrome extension that provides real-time coding assistance, and 'WORKFORCE,' a markdown-supported blogging platform for tech enthusiasts. Proficient in C++, Data Structures & Algorithms, Web Development, and Database Management, I continuously seek to expand my knowledge and work on innovative solutions. I am always eager to collaborate on exciting projects and push the boundaries of technology.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to connect with me for exciting collaborations!

education.description: Currently a sophomore, specializing in software development and web technologies.
Passed with 97.75% in the ISC Board Examinations.

testimonials.text: Swapnaneel is an incredibly talented developer. His projects are both innovative and impactful.
His dedication to building scalable and user-friendly applications is truly commendable. Looking forward to seeing more of his work!
